pageContent: Objective: Review of the oncological results of the radical prostatectomy as initial treatment of prostate cancer, according to the surgical approach and the risk stratification using D'Amico risk groups.

metaData.source:
Radical perineal prostatectomy for palpable, clinically localized, non-obstructive cancer: experience at the Johns Hopkins Hospital 1909-1963
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/7420591/
